author: christopherbrumm
content:
Does anyone know where to get checkpoints from before Dencun?

Like https://checkpointz.pietjepuk.net/

author: parithosh
content:
If you have a running node, you can query API for the state of an epoch pre-dencun. 
https://lighthouse-book.sigmaprime.io/checkpoint-sync.html#manual-checkpoint-sync
